columns.text: In this problem, we will determine the value of an investment that offers $4,350 per year for 15 years, and the required return is 6%. Additionally, we will also identify the value of the investment if the term is increased to 40 years, 75 years, and forever.

To determine the value of the investment, we will use the PMT function in a spreadsheet to calculate the present value of the investment after 15 years, 40 years, 75 years, and forever. We'll employ the following syntax of the PMT function in the spreadsheet.

$$\begin{aligned}
PV&=(\text{rate},nper,pmt,[fv],[type]) \\
\end{aligned}$$


Where:

$nper$, which refers to the period\
$pv$, which represents the present value\
$PMT$, which identifies the cash payment\
$type$, which indicates the basis of the calculation, either year-end or beginning of the year

Let's start by estimating the investment value after 15 years.

We will use the cash received per year of $4,350 as the cash amount in the formula; the rate to be used is the 6% rate of a required return and the period of 15 years. Hence, we'll consider the following factors:

| Particulars  |          |
|--------------|----------|
| Cash payment | $4,350   |
| Rate         | 6%       |
| Period       | 15 years |

Let's now calculate the present value of the investment for 15 years in the spreadsheet. The cash payment should in negative for the function to perform correctly.

!['slader'](https://slader-solution-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/d82ee63c-411a-4f83-adb2-5e0f1bf56feb-1652160891193300.png)

**Hence, the value of the investment over a period of 15 years is $42,248.28.**

Next, let's determine the present value of the investment, supposed the period is 40 years instead of 15 years.

!['slader'](https://slader-solution-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/02f3d1a5-c98c-4d17-bd26-afbd32613066-1652161060442183.png)

**Based on our calculation, the present value of the investment, if the period is 40 years, is $65,451.39.**

Let's now identify the present value of the investment if the period is 75 years.

!['slader'](https://slader-solution-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/49fc6854-03ef-4e26-9e30-3b0bcebedccf-1652161280516170.png)

**Therefore, the value of the investment, if the period is 75 years, is $71,582.94.**

In summary, if we calculate the present value of the investment at various periods, the value of the investment is as follows:
| Period     | Present value |
|------------|---------------|
| 15         | $42,248.28    |
| 40         | $65,451.39    |
| 75         | $71,582.94    |
| Perpetuity | $72,500       |
